CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT CHI and INV enter the room . MOT is holding CHI but immediately puts him on the floor
INV explains warm-up task to MOT
MOT kneels on the ground and looks at the picture on the book cover she picks up
MOT sits on the floor holding the picture book
MOT looks at CHI and points to the picture in the book
MOT points to the picture and tries to get CHI attention
MOT points to the same picture
CHI stands with his back to MOT looking at the camera
MOT turns the pages in the book
MOT holds the book open for CHI to see and points to the pictures in the book
MOT points to the pictures in the book
CHI watches MOT and then turns around to look at the camera again
MOT lays the book out in front of CHI
CHI stands with his back against the wall looking at the picture in the book
MOT closes the jack+in+the+box that was open
MOT puts the jack+in+the+box in front of CHI
CHI bends down and turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
MOT watches CHI play with the jack+in+the+box
CHI turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI stands up and looks at the jack+in+the+box
MOT rolls the car in front of CHI
MOT looks at CHI waiting for a reaction
CHI watches MOT roll the car and then stands up against the wall and looks at the camera
CHI runs over to the table
MOT holds out the duck for CHI to see
MOT strains to see what the CHI is doing at the desk
CHI stands near the table and looks at the pumpkin
MOT continues to squeeze the duck
CHI reaches out to touch an object on the desk
CHI holds the football high above his head and then lets it fall
MOT screws up her face in mock fear
CHI runs off to the other side of the room and rolls the toy car along the floor
MOT squeezes the duck in front of CHI face
MOT looks at the picture book and tries to get CHI attention
MOT opens the picture book up in front of CHI
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box steady for CHI to wind
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box and waits for the CHI to wind it up
CHI begins to wind the jack+in+the+box with difficulty
CHI pushes the jack back into the box but cannot close the lid
CHI tries to get the jack down into the box
CHI turns the handle and then picks up the car
MOT looks at the picture book
CHI turns the handle while holding the car in his left
CHI puts the jack+in+the+box back in but cannot close the box and so he gives up and picks up the toy car
MOT looks at the CHI and then up at the glass wall
MOT looks first at the CHI and then around the room
MOT points to a picture on the wall behind her
MOT looks at CHI waiting for a response
CHI pushes the jack into the box
<bef> MOT points to the large chair
MOT pulls the large chair over and pats the seat
CHI tries to push the jack down into the box but cannot close the box
CHI points to the wall with the frog picture
CHI points to the wall again
CHI continues to play with the cat and the jack+in+the+box
MOT takes the duck and squeezes it while moving it closer to the CHI
MOT gives the duck to the CHI
CHI gets up and runs over to the stool holding the duck
CHI prepares to sit as the INV enters
CHI runs away from the stool near the door

INV enters the room at 11:26:21 to explain the Small Scale Activity to MOT and then leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place . INV re-enters at 11:31:43 and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table . INV gives CHI the brush toy to hold
INV takes the Forbidden Object out of the drawer
INV sets the object in motion on the table
CHI stares at the Forbidden Object on the table
CHI stretches out his hand to touch the base of the object
MOT whispers and then blows on the balls to move them
MOT touches CHI hand to stop him from touching the Forbidden Object
CHI tries to grab the Forbidden Object
MOT grabs CHI hand and cuddles his hands . MOT cuddles CHI
INV puts the Forbidden Object away
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from Small Scale Activity
MOT takes the ball out of the box and sits on the floor holding the ball in front of the CHI
MOT gives the ball to the CHI
CHI holds the ball over her head
MOT sits waiting to receive the ball with her hands stretched out
CHI holds the ball up in the air and drops it into MOT lap
MOT holds out her arms to receive the ball
CHI throws the ball and misses MOT lap instead the ball bounces off MOT legs
MOT points to the ball at the other side of the room
CHI fetches the ball and runs over to the table with it
CHI sets the ball on the table
the ball rolls off the table and the CHI follows it
MOT opens her arms out with her hands facing upwards looking at the CHI with an expression of expectation
CHI runs over to the ball
CHI holds hands in the same position as MOT
CHI picks up the ball and walks over to MOT
MOT opens her hands to receive the ball
CHI sets the ball on the table
the ball rolls off the table
CHI looks around the table and then turns away
CHI squeezes past the chair in order to get the ball
CHI walks across the room with the ball
MOT opens out her hands waiting for the ball
CHI stares at the camera while holding the ball
CHI holds up the ball and prepares to throw it to MOT
MOT opens out her arms to receive the ball
CHI drops the ball behind him
MOT puts the ball back into the box
CHI runs over to the boxes and tries to get the ball back out of the box
MOT puts the next box on her lap and opens it
CHI walks over to look at the box
CHI knocks the peekaboo box over and tries to take the ball out of the box
MOT takes the cloth out of the box and watches CHI
MOT holds the cloth while all the boxes fall down
CHI tries to get the ball
MOT picks CHI up and moves him away from the boxes
MOT picks CHI up and moves him away from the boxes
MOT picks up CHI to move him away from the ball
MOT set the CHI into a box by accident and grabs the CHI to steady him
MOT holds the cloth in front of CHI
CHI tries to get past MOT to the ball
CHI cries with frustration as he steps on the box and it hits him
MOT puts the cloth in the box
CHI stands and looks at MOT
CHI makes a sitting down action while speaking
CHI watches MOT open the box
MOT pats the floor to indicate that CHI should sit there
MOT spreads out the papers and pats them
CHI makes a mark on the paper
MOT gives CHI another sheet of paper
MOT steadies the paper for CHI
<$=2> MOT holds out the crayon for CHI
MOT holds out a crayon for CHI
CHI walks around holding a crayon
CHI runs over to the table with the boxes on it
<bef> MOT lets out an irritated sigh
MOT tries to stop the box from falling
MOT tries to get the boxes back together
CHI picks up the book that fell out of the box
MOT picks up the box and puts away the paper and the cloth in the box
CHI opens the book while standing with his back against the wall
CHI nods head up and down imitating a horse
MOT nods head up and down like a horse
CHI nods head up and down like a horse while holding the closed book
CHI makes high pitched squeaking noises
CHI walks over to the stool holding the book
MOT slides over the stool for CHI to sit on
CHI falls while trying to sit down
MOT pats CHI on the behind
CHI tries to climb on the stool
MOT puts CHI on the stool
CHI makes a strange animal noise
CHI runs over to the table and drops the book
CHI shakes his head and waves his arms around
<$=4> MOT puts the cloth inside the box and opens and closes it while speaking
CHI points over to the table with the boxes on it
CHI runs over to the table
CHI out of camera view but he throws some toys from the a different box in room onto the table emptying the box out
MOT gives CHI an angry look
CHI stands with the empty box on his head
CHI drops the box onto the floor
CHI picks up a spoon off the table and walks around holding it
CHI walks out of camera view
MOT picks up the book and holds it
CHI puts the spoon on the table and then sits on the ground
CHI has some difficulty sitting up
MOT holds out the book to CHI
CHI runs over to the boxes and takes out the ball
MOT takes the book and puts it in the box and closes the box
CHI holds the ball up in front of the camera and then drops it on the ground
MOT goes behind the table to get the ball
MOT rolls the ball out to CHI
MOT holds out her arms to receive the ball
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT throws the ball to CHI
CHI holds the ball up in the air
CHI tries to get the ball under the table
MOT watches CHI who is still under the table
CHI crawls out from under the table backwards
MOT holds the ball for CHI
CHI hits his head on the table
CHI gets up and walks over by MOT
MOT wags her finger at CHI
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT throws the ball back to CHI
CHI looks at the camera holding the ball above his head
MOT points her finger to the ground near her
MOT holds the box for CHI to throw the ball into
CHI is out of camera view
MOT pats the bottom of the box
MOT puts the box on the ground
CHI squats next to the box with the ball
the ball rolls away before CHI can put it in the box
MOT throws the ball into the box
CHI takes the ball out of the box
CHI walks over to the table holding the ball and puts it on the table top
MOT indicates that he should drop the ball onto the box
CHI holds the ball and kicks the box
CHI tries to regain his balance
CHI throws the ball to MOT
MOT throws the ball up in the air
MOT gives the ball to CHI
CHI holds the ball up in the air and then holds it near the floor
CHI holds the ball over his head
CHI drops the ball on the floor
CHI looks around and then at the trash barrel
CHI holds the ball high over his head and turns to face MOT
<aft> CHI throws the ball into the box
the ball bounces out of the box
MOT picks up the ball and puts it in the box
CHI turns the box upside down to get the ball out of the box
CHI prepares to throw the ball
MOT opens her arms out to receive the ball
MOT pretends to throws the ball
CHI tries to catch the ball
CHI takes the ball and puts it on the table
CHI watches the ball roll on the table
CHI bangs the spoon on the table
<bef> CHI knocks the spoon onto the chair . CHI picks up the ball and walks away from the table
CHI takes the ball and throws it at the waste basket
the ball bounces onto the floor
CHI retrieves the ball and tries to throw it into the box
CHI tries to drop the ball into the box but misses
